nodes.text: Nerfsteak Seasoning was a type of seasoning created by the Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs, who served it from his traveling restaurant, Tuggs' Grub. It was a brown powder that used salt as a base. Tuggs initially designed it for use in seasoning just nerf steaks, but quickly discovered that it went well with just about anything, including tip-yip or Fritzle Fries.

At some point after the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, the chef included the recipe for the seasoning in The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, in which he recommended that anyone making the seasoning use quality salt—such as that found on the planet Crait—as the base. Tuggs claimed in the book that he knew a Wookiee who would not leave home without a shaker of the seasoning in his bandolier. The book also listed Nerfsteak Seasoning as an ingredient in Nerf Kebabs.

Nerfsteak Seasoning was created as one of the recipes in the 2019 Star Wars cook book, Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was written by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak. The out-of-universe recipe for Nerfsteak Seasoning combines paprika, salt, brown sugar, ground cumin, granulated garlic, pepper, and crushed dried savory.
